channel.title: Pattern Rite (Pt 1 & Pt 2) - Charles Gedius [BandCamp]
channel.description:
Fellow Auxy'ians,
Today 12/12/2017, Pattern Rite (Part 1 & Part 2) is now released in Bandcamp, I would like to thank you for the Plays on both tracks in SC, but sadly i have to make both tracks private/taken down the album (for Album release purposes) tomorrow 13/12/2017. (you still have time to listen today on the album in SC [Pattern Rite: Soon will be taken down. Listen now](https://soundcloud.com/charlesgedius/sets/pattern-rite-ambinematic)
and again Wish me luck on the Journey with Auxy App :bowing_man:
**The Most important now** :point_down::point_down::point_down: [Pattern Rite in Bandcamp need your support :)](https://cgedius.bandcamp.com/releases)
![2|500x500](upload://m4YcrdaVagw1Buah3BqROQK3Tnm.jpg)
Cheers, Charles Gedius

item.title: Pattern Rite (Pt 1 & Pt 2) - Charles Gedius [BandCamp]
item.dc:creator: cgedius
item.description:
Great suggestion @akabillposters , so i can replace the existing track to a new one, i might do that then. I’ll work it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Pattern Rite (Pt 1 & Pt 2) - Charles Gedius [BandCamp]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Don’t be sorry (for us). You’re just taking the next step.
It’s good to see. So, congrats and good luck.

I appreciate your music and I’m glad to see you pushing it forward.

 
I would at least recommend having (e.g.) 30-second previews of the track(s) on SC and then use the description and SC’s ‘Buy’ links feature (Edit > Metadata) to push listeners through to the BandCamp page.

(Consider swapping the original file on SC, rather than taking the full track down and uploading a preview, as then you’ll keep all plays, likes and reposts – although it might make comments seem decontextualised.)

Read full topic
